i18n.iface

Interface LocalizationController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleLocalizationController

    public interface LocalizationController
    Interface for classes implementing the localization subsystem.
    Author:
    Stefan Werner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addLocalizationResource(java.lang.String componentId, java.lang.String resourceLocation)
      Adds an external localization resource to the system.
      java.lang.String getFormatedDateDefault(long date)
      Gets a formated date (default style).
      java.lang.String getFormatedDateLocalized(long date)
      Gets a formated date (localized style).
      java.lang.String getLocalizedString(java.lang.String defaultString)
      Gets a localized string.
      java.lang.String getLocalizedString(java.lang.String defaultString, boolean onlyUseFrameworkResources)
      Gets the localized string.
      TextOrientationType getLocalTextOrientation()
      Gets the local text orientation (left to right or right to left).
      boolean removeLocalizationResource(java.lang.String componentId)
      Removes an external localization resource from the system.

    • Method Detail

      • addLocalizationResource

        boolean addLocalizationResource(java.lang.String componentId,
                                java.lang.String resourceLocation)
        Adds an external localization resource to the system.
        Parameters:
        componentId - the component ID adding the resource
        resourceLocation - the resource location
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • getFormatedDateDefault

        java.lang.String getFormatedDateDefault(long date)
        Gets a formated date (default style).
        Parameters:
        date - the date
        Returns:
        the formated date default

      • getFormatedDateLocalized

        java.lang.String getFormatedDateLocalized(long date)
        Gets a formated date (localized style).
        Parameters:
        date - the date
        Returns:
        the formated date localized

      • getLocalizedString

        java.lang.String getLocalizedString(java.lang.String defaultString)
        Gets a localized string. Will return the default string if localized version is unavailable.
        Parameters:
        defaultString - the default string
        Returns:
        the localized string

      • getLocalizedString

        java.lang.String getLocalizedString(java.lang.String defaultString,
                                    boolean onlyUseFrameworkResources)
        Gets the localized string. Will return the default string if localized version is unavailable. Will optionally only consider internal resources and not externally added ones.
        Parameters:
        defaultString - the default string
        onlyUseFrameworkResources - set to true to only use internal framework resources
        Returns:
        the localized string

      • getLocalTextOrientation

        TextOrientationType getLocalTextOrientation()
        Gets the local text orientation (left to right or right to left).
        Returns:
        the local text orientation

      • removeLocalizationResource

        boolean removeLocalizationResource(java.lang.String componentId)
        Removes an external localization resource from the system.
        Parameters:
        componentId - the component id
        Returns:
        true, if successful
